name: The Beetle's Red Berry
description:
A point-and-click puzzle game about controlling a collection of bugs to arrange the forest in just the right way to cause a berry to fall down to a beetle. It's unintuitive and difficult to see where to click, but I think it's fun! I made it a long time ago, so it probably won't receive updates.

The game was inspired from photos I took while exploring botanical gardens and my own backyard.
